reviewText: This DVD(MOVIE) was good all-in-all. But I think it should have showed just a little bit more of them in the thongs, binkinis, and skimpy suits. reviewText: Why are some people so obsessed with being disappointed or stressing that there's no nudity on a WWF/E DVD? Go get a porn video. This is my favorite Divas DVD, featuring Trish, Lita, Stacy Keibler, Torrie Wilson, Sharmell (pre-Ms. Booker T), Sara, Ivory, Jacqueline, & Terri. This was during the Invasion angle, & in the roughly 8 minute interview segments, some WCW footage is shown, including Stacy as a Nitro Girl & Miss Hancock, Sharmell as a Nitro Girl, Torrie Wilson in the WCW ring, & Terri as Ms. Alexandra York. The normal footage of the Divas photo-shoot is shown, & some on-location stuff (Lita & Trish swimming with dolphins, among others) make this quite enjoyable.Extras include the Babe of the Year photo-shoot, a Raw Magazine photo-shoot with Torrie & Stacy, & 10 matches:- Stephanie McMahon-Helmsley vs Trish Stratus - No Way Out (02.25.2001) - AWESOME MATCH- Tag Team Bra & Panties Match: Trish Status & Lita vs Torrie Wilson & Stacy Keibler - InVasion (07.22.2001)- Lingerie Match: Torrie Wilson vs Stacy Keibler - No Mercy (10.21.2001)- Egg Nog Match: Torrie Wilson vs Stacy Keibler - Raw (12.24.2001)- Six-Pack Challenger for the Women's Championship: Lita vs Jacqueline vs Trish Stratus vs Ivory vs Mighty Molly vs Jazz - Survivor Series (11.18.2001)- Gravy Bowl Match: Stacy Keibler vs Trish Stratus - SmackDown! (11.22.2001)- Women's Championship: Trish Stratus (c) vs Jacqueline - Vengeance (12.09.2001)- Six-Woman Tag Team Match: Lita, Mighty Molly, & Jacqueline vs Ivory, Torrie Wilson, & Stacy Keibler - Raw (08.20.2001)- Women's Championship: Trish Stratus (c) vs Lita - Raw (11.19.2001)- Spanking Match: Trish Stratus vs Torrie Wilson - Raw (07.23.2001)There's also a hidden section - in the Extras area, click left on the Gravy Bowl Match to unlock 'Divas Secrets', featuring Favorite Lingerie, Worse Pick-up Lines, What If, Good or Bad, First Time, & more.2001/02 was very good for the Divas, & this DVD shows it. My highest recommended Divas DVD.

reviewText: Let's face it-there may be one or two guys out there who don't just buy this for the stimulating interviews and the chance to study the sociological, if not physiological, issues that affect a small percentage of 20-something year old females. Those females being divas, naturally.Don't get me wrong, i'm a completely hetero man who would run over my own Grandmother to spend 5 minutes alone with any of these chicks.But the time and place for that sort of carnal dreaming is most assuredly NOT while viewing this rare glimpse into the hearts, mind, and yes, souls of a small but vital group of individuals living amongst us. Keep your filthy gutter thoughts to yourselves, animals. If anybody did buy this DVD for that purpose, I urge them to either:a)Return it with a sincere apology to the store clerk and manager;b)If Catholic, say 10 Hail Marys the next time you're in the confession booth. (But stay away from Father O'Malley, the guy's all hands!)c)If your remorse is too unbearable to go on living, feel free to continue on as a Eunuch. I'm not really sure what that is, but i have a feeling it's a bit like your dog taking YOU to the vet!

reviewText: This is the best of the Divas Shoots if you care to get to know them outside the ring. They show Terri shopping, Sharmell dancing and so much more. Surprisingly, there isn't that much actual bikini shoot stuff shown on here, but it is still great and the extras are AWESOME! You can also see Taker's wife Sara in hot bikinis! *lol*

reviewText: For all the clueless dirty guys out there, expecting a DVD such as this one to feature nudity, keep searching the internet! These are WWF divas, not porn stars! Anyways, this is  a great dvd to have and add to your WWF/WWE collection as the beautiful divas of the WWF and Alliance get an equal amount of time (around 5-8 minutes for each diva) to share their experience about their photo shoots along the shore of the tropics. What you get here is all the girls just having fun, out of character, being themselves. They do a lot of up close shots on the bodies of each diva which is an A+. The beautiful bikini clad divas featured in this DVD are the following (in order): Stacy Keibler, Ivory, Sharmell, Torrie Wilson, Sara, Lita, Jacqueline, Terri, and Trish Stratus_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________On top of that, you're treated to 10 Diva matches from episodes of Raw and Smackdown as well as every diva match that took place on PPV starting at Invasion! They include:- No Way Out 2001: Stephanie McMahon Helmsley vs Trish Stratus- Invasion 2001: Tag Team Bra & Panties Match: Trish Stratus and Lita vs Torrie Wilson and Stacy Keibler- No Mercy 2001: Torrie Wilson vs Stacy Keibler - No Mercy (10/21/01)- Raw 12/24/01 Egg Nog Match: Torrie Wilson vs Stacy Keibler- Survivor Series 2001: Women's Championship 6 Pack Challenge - Lita vs Jacqueline vs Trish Stratus vs Ivory vs Mighty Molly vs Jazz- Smackdown 11/22/01: Gravy Bowl Match: Stacy Keibler vs Trish Stratus- Vengeance 2001: Women's Championship Match - Trish Stratus (c) vs Jacqueline- Raw 8/20/01: 6 Woman Tag Team Match: Lita, Mighty Molly, and Jacqueline vs Ivory, Torrie Wilson, and Stacy Keibler- Raw 11/19/01: Women's Championship Match - Trish Stratus (c) vs Lita- Raw 7/23/01: Paddle On A Pole Match - Trish Stratus vs Torrie Wilson_______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________Sidenotes:- Ivory and Lita each have a great toned belly! Their abs are rocking and have a nice average look to it- Sara is really attractive! I never really paid much attention to how beautiful she was until I viewed her on here. Pretty face and pretty voice! I can see why Undertaker married her and DDP was psychotically in love with her :)- Torrie Wilson looked absolutely gorgeous back then! She still does today, but when she was young, she was stunning!- Stacy Keibler is innocently beautiful. When you see her matches in the extras, you get to view her mean and feisty side, but during the photoshoots you get to see how nice, outgoing, and beautiful she really is. Pretty skin, nice long hair, great legs. The best part from her chapter and probably on the whole entire DVD was a shoot session of her on a tennis court that gives the viewer an absolutely eye popping of Stacy's bare butt cheeks!- Lita is very outgoing. She's always cracking jokes and being silly to make the best of her time out there!- Ivory is perhaps the nicest diva on here. When her section appears on the dvd, she starts naming numerous superstars on the roster she admires for their personality and looks- Copies of the DVD either came with a poster of Jacqueline or Torrie Wilson. My copy came with JacquelineAll in all this is one of the best Diva DVDs WWF/WWE have released! I'd recommend this DVD to anyone interested in seeing the gorgeous WWF Divas on the Bahama beaches posing for the camera in bikinis and see the divas out of character just be themselves!
summary: Great DVD To Have For Your Collection!
